alert.note: Alert for Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 27 at 10:39PM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL COLLIER AND SOUTH CENTRAL HENDRY COUNTIES... At 1039 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hendry Correctional, or 16 miles east of Ave Maria, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Hendry Correctional and Sunniland. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
